holidays.name: National Rocky Road Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the delightfully messy and chocolatey ice cream flavor mixing marshmallows, nuts, and chocolate! Perfect excuse to indulge in this rocky, sweet treat.
holidays.origin: The flavor was created in the 1920s to boost chocolate sales during the Great Depression.
holidays.funFact: Rocky Road was the first flavor of ice cream to mix in other ingredients — a groundbreaking idea at the time!

holidays.name: Leave The Office Early Day
holidays.description: A quirky unofficial holiday encouraging workers to punch out early and enjoy some well-deserved freedom — because sometimes the best productivity booster is a surprise early weekend!
holidays.origin: Created by creative professionals to promote work-life balance and discourage burnout.
holidays.funFact: This holiday has no official sanction, but many workplaces join in the fun by scheduling early releases or surprise breaks.

holidays.name: World Bicycle Day
holidays.description: A global celebration encouraging the use of bicycles for transport, health, and fun. Time to dust off that bike and ride into happiness!
holidays.origin: Declared by the United Nations in 2018 to highlight the benefits of sustainable transportation.
holidays.funFact: Bicycles outnumber cars worldwide and are often the fastest way to get around dense urban areas.

holidays.name: Godzilla Day
holidays.description: Honoring the legendary giant monster who first terrorized Tokyo in 1954. Perfect for monster movie marathons and roaring good times!
holidays.origin: Marks the anniversary of the original Godzilla film's Japanese release.
holidays.funFact: Godzilla’s roar was originally created by rubbing a leather glove coated in pine tar resin along the strings of a double bass.
